content: --संस्कारः, --संस्क्रिया [अंगं संस्क्रियते अनेन; कृ-करणे or भावे-घञ्] {1} embellishment of person, personal decoration, doing whatever secures a fine personal appearance, such as bathing, rubbing the body, perfuming it with cosmetics &c. {2} [कर्तरि अण्] one who decorates or embellishes the person.
